author: .vbuterin
content: Does the state regularly change or not? If it does not change, then Kate commitments are fine. If it changes and you only need single-item proofs, then binary Merkle trees are fine. If it changes and you need many-item proofs, then Verkle trees are state of the art.

author: .vbuterin
content: The best competition for Verkle trees is probably SNARK/STARKs over binary Merkle trees using arithmetic-friendly hash functions
